column1: #: description: $\Xi^0_{\rm c}$/${\rm D^0}$ ratio measured in pp collisions at $\sqrt{s}$ = 7 TeV for $|y| < 0.5$. The result now is divided by the BR
column2: which was not applied in the previous paper and HEPData. The uncertainty of the BR of ${\rm D^0}$ and $\Xi^0_{\rm c}$ are written separately
